content:
IReflectableType Interface

In this Article

Represents a type that you can reflect over.

Syntax

Declaration

public interface IReflectableType

Methods summary

GetTypeInfo()

Retrieves an object that represents this type.

Methods

  • GetTypeInfo()

    Retrieves an object that represents this type.

    public System.Reflection.TypeInfo GetTypeInfo ();

    Returns

    • TypeInfo

      An object that represents this type.
